database.fullpath: Database Environment :: Network-based DBMS :: Microsoft SQL Server

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Emulation and API Compatibility :: Cygwin (MS Windows)

name: Platinum Info-Student
short_description:
Platinum Info-Student is a WINDOWS platform dependent student information system based on .net. It can allow you to save , search , delete , update the information of students in the smartest way .


Version: 2.0.2 (Released at 31-Mar-2014)

Recommendations:
♦ You must have the Microsoft dotnetframework 3.5 installed in your system.
♦ You must have Microsoft SQL SERVER 2005/2008/2012 installed in your system in SQL AUTHENTICATION MODE and database user name , password have to be as follows :
USER NAME : sa
PASSWORD : cse

License: Freeware. You can use and redistribute this software for free without any modification of the files provided with the software.

Developer:
